_header: The sooth love among us be
_description: A homily on ‘Sothe Luue’ — fifteen 8-line stanzas

OxfJesus29.Transcription:
Þeo soþe luue a mong vs beoWyþ vten euch
                    endynge……And lede vs in to heouene blys& sette vs on
                    hus ryht honde
OxfJesus29.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of MS.
OxfJesus29.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             An Old English Miscellany: A Bestiary, Kentish Sermons, Proverbs of
                Alfred and Religious Poems of the Thirteenth Century.
EETS
         o.s. 49 (1872); repr. 1988: 141-4.
